At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Y-O Ranch, or over Wheatland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:47PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sioux and east central Goshen Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 446 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Torrington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 1:39PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms possible through this evening... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in Riverton. * WHAT...Showers and thunderstorms will continue to spread east this afternoon. Some thunderstorms may become strong, with gusty winds, pea size hail, and localized downpours.
